name: Psychic Disciple
description: You have opened your mind to the more advanced disciplines of basic psychic magic.
benefit: You gain the ability to cast a 1st-level psychic spell from the psychic classâ€™s spell list. You can cast this spell twice per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability is equal to your character level, and the save DC is equal to 11 + your Intelligence modifier.
special: You can take this feat multiple times, choosing a different spell each time.
